H0.text: What is the main ingredient in borscht. Cabbage

H1.text: What is the main ingredient in borscht. Carrot

H2.text: What is the main ingredient in borscht. Potato

H3.text: What is the main ingredient in borscht. Beet

A4.text: In Ukrainian beet-based red borscht has become the most popular.

A5.text: The same name, however, is also used for a wide selection of sour-tasting soups without beetroots, such as sorrel-based green borscht, rye-based white borscht, and cabbage borscht.

A6.text: beetroot soup, such as borscht [Ukrainian] and barszcz czerwony [Polish], is common.

A7.text: In Ukraine, a related dish called shpundra is also common; this hearty beetroot stew, often made with pork belly or ribs, is sometimes referred to as a thicker version of borscht.
